textBeforeTable: Correctable Section 01 fields are listed below: 3.12.251.5.1  (01-01-2015) Section 01 Field Errors Section 01 contains Remittance, Received Date, processing codes, entity data, and miscellaneous information. Computer generated fields are described under the appropriate Error Code(s). This section provides instructions for correcting Section 01 Field Errors. 3.12.251.5  (01-01-2015) Section 01 Data - Form 1120 Information related to ERS screen displays, invalid conditions and correction procedures are included in each section description. Form 1120 contains Sections 01 through 12, 14 through 18 and 20 through 25. 3.12.251.4  (01-01-2015) Form 1120 Sections and Fields If the taxpayer indicates Section 277 or states "minimum amount of tax" when there is no amount for taxable income present, accept the taxpayer's figures by using one or more verified fields. Homeowners Associations may file on Form 1120. When they do so, they are to be taxed at the normal corporate tax rate. 3.12.251.3.25  (01-01-2015) Homeowners Association Filing on Form 1120
textAfterTable: SSPND with Action Code "351." 3.12.251.5.4  (01-01-2015) Field 01TXP - Tax Period (XREF EC 007 or 026) The tax period is located in the upper right corner of the return. It is the ending month and year of the tax period covering the return. If the tax period is not the current calendar year, it is edited in year/month (YYYYMM) format. For example, December 31, 2014 is edited as "201412. " Invalid Condition - Field 01TXP is invalid if: It is not all numeric, The last two digits (month) are not 01 through 12, The tax period is equal to or after the current year and month, The tax period is blank. Correction Procedures: Correct coding and transcription errors and misplaced entries. Check the upper right corner of page one of the return for a correct tax period. If Then
